mapper.select: SELECT picture_url, writer, product_name, editor FROM product INNER JOIN review ON review.product_id = product.product_id ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc LIMIT 5

SELECT *
FROM review ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( bno, title, editor, writer, regdate, product_id ) VALUES ( null, #{title}, #{editor}, #{writer}, now(), #{product_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET title = #{title}, editor = #{editor}, writer = #{writer}, regdate = now() WHERE bno = #{bno}
